subject: LogConfigurationException
msgSnippet: I have a problem using JUnit with apache axis. When I run my test I get an exception like this: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError:
messageBody:
I have a problem using JUnit with apache axis. When I run my test I
get an exception like this:

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError:
org.apache.commons.logging.LogConfigurationException:
org.apache.commons.logg.....

Anybody seen anything like this?

I am using the latest version of JUnit(3.8.1) integrated into
Intellij, with apache axis 1.1.

Thanks for any help..
